abstract: LivingSocial gave the much-coveted lead underwriter positions for its forthcoming I.P.O. to Deutsche Bank, JPMorgan Chase and Bank of America Merrill Lynch.
snippet: LivingSocial gave the much-coveted lead underwriter positions for its forthcoming I.P.O. to Deutsche Bank, JPMorgan Chase and Bank of America Merrill Lynch.
lead_paragraph: 4:49 p.m. | Updated LivingSocial, the biggest competitor to Groupon in the social-coupon space, has picked three banks to lead its forthcoming initial public offering, people briefed on the matter told DealBook on Friday.

headline.main: LivingSocial Taps 3 Banks to Lead Its I.P.O.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced and Evelyn M. Rusli
